english: It is also possible to narrow some of the constraints if you need to
chinese: 如果需要，也可以缩小范围。到事务性方法的匹配

english: Or , if you have a limited number of resources , you might be able to reduce the scope
chinese: 或者，如果资源的数量有限，那么或许可以缩小范围。

english: Cutting scope , for instance , often means eliminating some goals and the tasks needed to fulfill those goals
chinese: 如果缩小范围，一般就意味着要去掉部分目标以及完成那些目标所需的任务。

english: For example , if you have a deadline that can ' t be missed and you can ' t remove tasks to reduce the scope , perhaps you can hire more resources
chinese: 譬如，如果有个不能超出的期限，并且不能删除任务来缩小范围，那么您或许可以雇佣更多的资源。
缩小范围造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Abstract : according to the similitude definition between data , this paper proposes an efficient multi - dimension fuzzy clusteringalgorithm by dimension reducing and sorting
chinese: 文摘:本文根据数据间相似程度的定义，利用排序缩小范围，提出一种多维数据聚类的算法。

english: If domino has crashed and is not able to restart , remove tasks from the notes . ini variable servertask and attempt to narrow down and identify the task causing the crash
chinese: 如果domino已经崩溃，并且不能重启，那么从notes . ini变量servertask删除任务，并试图缩小范围和识别导致崩溃的任务。

english: France and turkey have fiercely secular traditions that can be interpreted to justify restrictions on religious symbols ; but such restrictions are best applied sparingly , and only in state offices , not in the streets
chinese: 法国和土耳其都有极强的世俗传统，这种传统或许可以解释为何要对宗教标志做出限制，不过，此类限制要尽可能缩小范围，比如在政府办公室禁，在大街上不禁。
